data.title: Nancy Juvonen Age, Weight, Married, Husband, Children, Net worth
data.meta_description: Nancy Juvonen is an American producer famous for co-owning a production company known as Flower Films. Juvonen who was born in Marin County, California is
data.text:
Nancy Juvonen is an American producer famous for co-owning a production company known as Flower Films.

Juvonen who was born in Marin County, California is also popular as a writer and wife of famous American comedian and TV host James Thomas Fallon. Nancy may not be an actress, but her creative work in film production that spans nearly two decades has earned her well-deserved fame and accolades in the industry.

Nancy Juvonen Biography, Age

Nancy Juvonen was born on the 18th day of May 1969 in the northern coast of California, USA, and she attended the University of Southern California where she earned a degree in sociology and cooperative education. Her career as a producer began a few years after graduating from college and working as a flight attendant and performer in various private companies before landing her first breakthrough job as an assistant to Clarence Clemons, a member of the E-Street Band.

Nan, as she is often called, burst onto the scene in 1999 when she found her way to Hollywood and made her debut as executive producer of the CGI-animated Christmas TV special, Olive , The Other Reindeer and Never Been Kissed, a romantic comedy film directed by Raja Gosnell. The success of these two films helped her to become famous. Her interest in storytelling led her to partner with Drew Barrymore in the creation of a production company called Lower Films. Barrymore is an actress, director, model, producer, and member of the Barrymore family of American stage and film actors. She is the granddaughter of a popular stage actor in the 90s, John Barrymore.

Nancy met Barrymore during production of the romantic drama film, Crazy Love and thanks to Nancy’s brother Jim who introduced them to each other, they were able to quickly develop a bond which resulted in the production company being formed in 1996 Their first film, Never Been Kissed which was produced in 1999 catapulted them to fame and paved the way for more productions.

Net value

Nancy is not only known for her excellent production skills, she gained much more fame when she started appearing in magazines and amassed an enviable fanbase with her positive vibes. Some of the notable films she has co-produced include Martian Child, Whip It! , It’s Not All That Into You, How to Be Single, and Fixer-Upper. Today, she has earned around $20 million as a filmmaker.

Is Nancy Juvonen Married? Husband, Children

Nancy Juvonen is married to comedian and host of The Tonight Show, Jimmy Fallon. The couple married on December 22, 2007 and have lived together as husband and wife ever since.

The couple first met in 2005 during production of the romantic comedy film, Overexcitement. She was introduced to Jim by his friend and co-producer Drew Barrymore who at the time was working with him in the production of the Fever Pitch film. In 2007 they officially started dating, after Barrymore invited Jim to a birthday party she threw for Nancy and a few months later Jim engaged Nancy with an engagement ring designed by Neil Lane at Wolfeboro on Lake Winnipesaukee in New Hampshire. The engagement was seen by a number of Nancy’s family members. Four months later they were already married and in 2013 they had their first child, a daughter whom

The birth of Winnie came after many hardships for the couple to conceive, Nancy is seven years older than her husband who was born on September 19, 1974. The couple spent five years of their marriage trying to conceive but as all efforts went proved unsuccessful, they settled for gestational surrogacy, also called gestational surrogacy, a process an embryo created by in vitro fertilization technology is implanted into a surrogate. Their second daughter, Frances Cole, was born the same way in 2014.

Nancy Juvonen Height and Weight

The American producer weighs 55 kg or 121 pounds. Although her height is not yet known, she is a little shorter than her husband who is 6 feet tall, 4 inches taller than the average American man. Jimmy is also 86 kg or 190 pounds in weight.

Nancy Juvonen in a nutshell
